Class SwingPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.swingimpl.SwingPlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, FontManager, GraphicsManager, InputManager, MouseCheck, SpritesheetTextureManager, TextureManager, ToggleFullScreen, ViewportZoomScale, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphicsManager, FontManager, TextureManager, MouseCheck, SpritesheetTextureManager, InputManager, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, ViewportZoomScale, ToggleFullScreen
